AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Raymond McMillon: defendant, appellant, and passenger in a tractor-trailer with undocumented aliens, convicted of alien transportation offenses, traveled with co-defendant to Laredo
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Zeba Williams: co-defendant, driver of the tractor-trailer, asked McMillon to accompany him to pick up commercial equipment
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Luis Pena: Border Patrol Agent who approached the driver-side door at an immigration checkpoint near Freer, Texas
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Manuel Hernandez: Border Patrol Agent who prepared to have his canine perform a sniff of the tractor-trailer's exterior
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Raymond McMillon and Zeba Williams: pair who traveled together from Houston to San Antonio and then to Laredo
